name: Corpse Lanterns
effect: up to 4 lights, all within a 10-ft.-radius area
text: This spell functions as dancing lights, except it summons up to four spheres of light, each of which glows a sickly pale green. These corpse lanterns shed dim light in a 20-foot radius, and do not increase the light level in areas of normal light or bright light. In dim or normal light, the radiance of corpse lanterns provides a strange contrast, giving all creatures in the area a –5 penalty on Stealth checks. In addition, the hue interferes with illusion (pattern) spells, giving all creatures in the illuminated area a +2 bonus on any saving throws against such spells. Unlike dancing lights, you may have more than one corpse lanterns spell active at a time, but you may only move one set in any given round. Moving the corpse lanterns does not require concentration. Corpse lanterns can be made permanent on an area with a permanency spell by a caster of at least 11th level for the cost of 7,500 gp.
target_zh: 至多四个光源，全都聚集于10尺半径区域内
text_zh: 此法术运作方式如同舞光术，但它最多能召唤四颗球形光源，每颗都发出病态的苍白色绿光。尸体提灯会在半径20尺内散发流光，如果区域内的光照等级是常光或是强光，那它就不会增加区域内的光照程度。于昏暗或常光光照时，尸体提灯的光会提供奇异的对比，会让所有在区域内的生物，于隐匿检定中承受-5罚值。此外，因为对幻术系(心灵幻觉)法术的色调干扰(hue interferes)，本法术会让所有在照亮区域内的生物，在对炕这类法术时于所有豁免检定上获得+2加值。不同于舞光术，你同时间可以激活多个尸体提灯，但你在一轮中只能控制其中一个。尸体提灯可以被魔法恒定术恒定，这需要11级的师法者以及7500gp。
